name: Monochrome Kingdom
description:
Monochrome Kingdom is a retro style open world RPG with six playable classes. You can create a party of four and search the Kingdom for adventure.

Your quest: to find a powerful artefact and keep it safe from the evil grasp of a living God.

The Six Classes:

  • Fighter
  • Rogue
  • Wizard
  • Cleric
  • Monk
  • Paladin

How to Play:

WASD or Arrow Keys - Move Z, Enter or Space - Interact/ConfirmESC or X - Menu/Cancel  Shift - Run  F5 - Fullscreen   F6 - Toggle Resolution
